edu.unh.cs.cs619.bulletzone.Grid

Class DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • edu.unh.cs.cs619.bulletzone.Grid.DatabaseHelper

  • public class DatabaseHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper

    DatabaseHelper Class!

    The database helper class is what is responsible for adding to the database in the poller and retrieving from the database in the replay activity.
    Since:
    11/12/2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Justin Moore

      • setDidWeGetLastIDToFalse

        public void setDidWeGetLastIDToFalse()
        This method sets didWeGetLastID to false, which is used to track if we have gotten the last played game ID or not. If not, we know to update GAME ID in database in add Data

      • isDatabaseEmpty

        public boolean isDatabaseEmpty()
        This method checks if the database is empty
